meanings.sent1: The puppy's adorability melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: Her adorability made her the favorite in the family.
meanings.sent3: The adorability of the baby's giggles was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The adorability of the kitten was like a ray of sunshine in the room.
meanings.sent5: The adorability of the teddy bear was unmatched, bringing joy to all who saw it.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being lovable or charming.
meanings.sent1: The adorability of the child's smile was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The adorability of the character made the movie a hit.
meanings.sent3: Her adorability in the costume contest won her first place.
meanings.sent4: The adorability of the old couple's dance was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The adorability of the song lyrics touched everyone's soul.
